options.main_menu.title: Main menu
options.main_menu.logoVisualizerShow.inf: Activate the spectrum of the logo
Hovering the mouse pointer over the logo will play the map's hit sound instead of the n-beat sound
options.main_menu.logoEffectEnable.info: Apply some effects to your logo
options.sdjk_map_loader.title: SDJK Map Loder
options.sdjk_map_loader.osuManiaNoteSpee: Determines the speed of notes when loading osu!mania maps as SDJK maps
notice.main_menu.no_map.info: None of the maps are in the selected ruleset
ruleset.super_hexagon.warning: Please note that the Super Hexagon mod can be deleted at any time due to copyright issues
ruleset.adofai.unplayable:
A Dance of Fire and Ice ruleset has no gameplay due to copyright issues.<size=10>

</size><size=15>Please play with a different ruleset that can convert the map instead</size>
mode.automatic.auto.info: A great computer that won't go wrong even 1 ms will play
mode.difficulty.slow.info: Slows down by the amount of time it takes for a turtle to win a game of rock-paper-scissors with an ant passing by
mode.difficulty.combo_multiplier.info: Are you getting a low score because you keep missing? Give this mod a try!
mode.converter.key_count.info: I think it will be difficult if there are too many keys. Yes?
mode.converter.hold_off.info: It's really hard to hit a note in the middle of a hold note!
